title: Health regen
body: Well theres something Im a bit confused about and its the health regen so like Ive got at least 8.9 regen on my runes then I have the 2 masteries that give u more health regen yet if I join a game i start with only like 6 health regen or 3.4 so can someone explain why this happens? like if its to stop it from being op then I understand because like having something like 13.5 health regen at lvl 1 is too op but it doesn't say anything about a health regen cap

replies.body:
Hey Kenja,

The Health Regen number displayed on your health bar is shown in per second format I believe. For your health per/5 total expand your Champion Stats window to the left of your portrait by clicking the helmet icon or pressing your hotkey.
So to get this straight my health regen isn't going down or anything? its just showing different things

Yes. On your actual health bar in the bottom middle of the screen it shows health regen per second. The amounts in masteries/runes and shown in your expanded character stats are always regen per 5 (it's the same with mana). The ONLY place you will see regen per second is on your actual health bar down the bottom. 

So if you had 8.9 health regen in runes, its per 5, so you have 1.8~ regen per second which is what would show on your health bar. Add in masteries etc and you'd get the numbers you've been seeing.

Hope I explained it clearly enough :)
